titles.title: I Could Sing Of Your Love Forever

comments.comment:
ending (optional)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v1 v2 c2 b1 e1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
E
Over the mountains and the sea
Your river runs with love for me
And I will open up my heart
And let the Healer set me free

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm happy to be in the truth
And I will daily lift my hands
For I will always sing
Of when Your love came down

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I could sing of Your love forever (x4)

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: I will sing of Your love forever (x4)

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Oh I feel like dancing
It's foolishness I know
But when the world
Has seen the light
They will dance with joy
Like we're dancing now

verse.name: e1
verse.lines: We will sing of you love forever (x4)
